_header: My lords of Chalker please you to hear
Title(s): ‘To the lordis of the kingis chalker’
Subjects: Chalker, lords of; satire; political poems
_description: ‘To the lordis of the kingis chalker’, by William Dunbar — four 5-line stanzas

CULLl510.First Lines:
My Lordis of chalker pleis ȝow to heirMy coumpt I sall It mak
                    ȝow cleir…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…I haue na preiff heir bot my pursQuhilk wald not lie & it
                    war luikit
